sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"有，具有，持有"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: have, hold, own, possess, keep, enjoy
means: have ： 最常用词，可指任何情况下的具有，无论是物质的或精神的。
hold ： 指拥有并保持财产及持有见解等，暗示不让别人拿走或占有。
own不及本组的possess正式，多指所属关系，强调所有权，不管所属物是否在物主手中。
possess ： 较正式，指拥有或占有并能加以控制与支配，强调其归属；也指具有某种品质、才能、特点或性能等。
keep ： 指长时间地保有，保存某物，防止别人占去，强调安全和感情上的依附。
enjoy ： 指享有某种权利或长处，带有欣赏或喜爱的情感。

sentence.Network_en: Generosity is its own form of power.
The happiest are not those who own all the best things, but those who can appreciate the beauty of life.
sentence.Network_cn: 最幸福的人们并不一定什么都是最好，只是他们懂得欣赏生活的美好。

sentence.Network_en: Amy's own Republican sympathies strengthened as the days passed.
sentence.Network_cn: 埃米个人对共和党的支持与日俱增。

PerfectNetExp.abs: clown n. 小丑【记法】分解为：cl（丑陋）＋own（自己）【联想】小丑为了取得观众的欢笑，常常丑化自己.
虞啸卿_百度百科 ... Normal（ 正规的） Own（ 自己的（own）） Pushy（ 固执己见的）.
词汇竞赛 - 中国习网 ... Free 使自由 Own 拥有 last 持续.
Rotation puzzle is the company ' s own design and development of new products ., 旋转拼图亦是公司自行开发设计的又新产品.

list.abs: TOFE听力习语... ... 9,out of tune 不一致,不协调 10,own up 承认过错,承认罪行,坦白承认 11,pass away 不再存在,中止,消失,灭亡.
企业的自有媒体(owned media)，即品牌自己可以控制的传播渠道，比如商店、网站、店面广告等等，这些媒体影响力往往比较有限; …
own的中文意思_百度知道 ... on your own 独立的，资源的 own brand 自有品牌；使用自己商标的商品 on his own 独立地；单刀.
足球术语中英对照_旺旺英语教学网 ... place kick 定位球 own goal 乌龙球 hat-trick 帽子戏法.

phrase.cizu_name: as if (或 like) one owns the place

jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)俨然那地方是他的（表示态度专横和妄自尊大）

jx.jx_en_mean: become fully effective, used, or recognized
jx.jx_cn_mean: 充分发挥作用，被充分使用；被充分认可

lj.lj_ly: the two folk languages will at last come into their own.
lj.lj_ls: 这两种部落语言最终将大行其道。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)take action in retaliation for a wrongdoing or insult
retain a position of strength in a challenging situation

lj.lj_ly: at last I've got a place of my own.
lj.lj_ls: 我终于有了自己的住所了。

jx.jx_en_mean: unaccompanied by others; alone or unaided
jx.jx_cn_mean: 独自地；独立地；不依靠别人帮助地

jx.jx_en_mean: admit or confess to having done something wrong or embarrassing

lj.lj_ls: 他只承认了很少的错误。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 拥有：完完全全属于某人自己

lj.lj_ly: She got the job on her own.
lj.lj_ls: 她自己找到了这份工作

jx.jx_en_mean: Responsible for oneself; independent of outside help or control
jx.jx_cn_mean: 靠自己的力量，独立地：自己对自己负责；独立于外来的帮助或控制之外

lj.lj_ly: He is now out of college and on his own.
lj.lj_ls: 他现在离开了大学并且自己生活

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English āgen (adjective and pronoun) 'owned, possessed', past participle of āgan 'owe'; the verb (Old English āgnian 'possess', also 'make own's own') was originally from the adjective, later probably reintroduced from owner

entry.def: You use own to indicate that something belongs to a particular person or thing.

example.ex: My wife decided I should have my own shop...
example.tran: 我妻子决定让我自己开店。

example.ex: ...another group of patients who were taught to change their own dressings...
example.tran: 另一组被教会自己换药的病人

entry.tran: 自己所用的；具有自己特点的；特有的
entry.def: You use own to indicate that something is used by, or is characteristic of, only one person, thing, or group.

example.ex: Jennifer insisted on her own room...
example.tran: 珍妮弗坚持要有自己的房间。

example.ex: I let her tell me about it in her own way...
example.tran: 我让她用自己的方式告诉我那件事。

entry.tran: 自己做的；单独干的；独立完成的
entry.def: You use own to indicate that someone does something without any help from other people.

example.ex: They enjoy making their own decisions...
example.tran: 他们喜欢自己作决定。

example.ex: Tony also built his own house from his own plans...
example.tran: 托尼还自己设计并盖好了房子。

entry.def: If you own something, it is your property.

example.ex: His father owns a local pub...
example.tran: 他父亲在当地有一家酒馆。

example.ex: At least three British golf courses are now owned by the Japanese.
example.tran: 现在英国至少有3家高尔夫球场为日本人所有。

entry.def: If you have something you can call your own, it belongs only to you, rather than being controlled by or shared with someone else.

example.ex: They don't yet have a country to call their own...
example.tran: 他们还没有自己的国家。

example.ex: I would like a place I could call my own.
example.tran: 我想要一个自己的窝儿。

entry.tran: （因情况适宜而）开始取得成功，开始进入（良好）状态
entry.def: If someone or something comes into their own, they become very successful or start to perform very well because the circumstances are right.

example.ex: The goalkeeper came into his own with a series of brilliant saves...
example.tran: 守门员开始进入状态，作出了一连串精彩的扑救。

example.ex: This is when geraniums and petunias come into their own.
example.tran: 这是天竺葵和矮牵牛盛开的时节。

entry.def: If you get your own back on someone, you have your revenge on them because of something bad that they have done to you.

example.ex: Renshaw reveals 20 bizarre ways in which women have got their own back on former loved ones.
example.tran: 伦肖揭示了20种女性用来报复旧情人的离奇手段。

entry.tran: 使只与自己相关；使为自己所有
entry.def: If you make something your own, you become involved in it in such a way that people think of it as being related only to you or belonging only to you, rather than to anyone else.

example.ex: Here again is the song that Pavarotti has made his own.
example.tran: 下面再次为您播放这首帕瓦罗蒂的标志性歌曲。

entry.tran: 属于自己的；关于自己的
entry.def: If you say that someone has a particular thing of their own, you mean that that thing belongs or relates to them, rather than to other people.

example.ex: You see, we have a problem of our own...
example.tran: 你知道，我们也有自己的问题。

example.ex: He set out in search of ideas for starting a company of his own.
example.tran: 他开始寻求思路创办自己的公司。

entry.def: If someone or something has a particular quality or characteristic of their own, that quality or characteristic is especially theirs, rather than being shared by other things or people of that type.

example.ex: Groups have a personality of their own...
example.tran: 每支乐队都有自己独特的风格。

example.ex: The cries of the seagulls gave this part of the harbour a fascinating character all of its own.
example.tran: 海鸥的鸣叫声给这片海港带来了迷人的独特气息。

entry.def: When you are on your own, you are alone.

example.ex: He lives on his own...
example.tran: 他独自一人生活。

example.ex: I told him how scared I was of being on my own...
example.tran: 我告诉他我有多害怕自己一个人。

entry.def: If you do something on your own, you do it without any help from other people.

example.ex: I work best on my own.
example.tran: 我独立工作的时候效果最好。

example.ex: ...the jobs your child can do on her own.
example.tran: 孩子能独立完成的事情

entry.tran: 傲慢；目中无人；颐指气使
entry.def: If you say that someone does something as if they own the place or like they own the place, you are critical of them because they do it in a very arrogant way.

example.ex: He struts around town like he owns the place.
example.tran: 他大摇大摆地在镇上四处晃悠，好像这是他的地盘。

means.word_mean: 1. belonging to or on behalf of a specified person (especially yourself); preceded by a possessive;

auth_sentence.content: The Romans had their own names for similar instruments.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Romans had their own names for similar instruments.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Romans had their own names for similar instruments.

auth_sentence.content: I think we have all made our own conclusions.
auth_sentence.res_content: I think we have all made our own conclusions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I think we have all made our own conclusions.

auth_sentence.content: We will push each other to our own limits.
auth_sentence.res_content: We will push each other to our own limits.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We will push each other to our own limits.

stems_affixes.word_buile: own拥有→adj.自己的 v.有,拥有
own拥有+er人→n.所有者, 业主
owner[n.所有者, 业主]+ship关系,状态→n.所有权, 物主身份
own拥有→adj.自己的 v.有,拥有

sentences.en: Bananas have their own characteristic smell.

sentences.cn: 我的时间不属于我自己。

means.word_mean: 自己做的, 为自己的

sentences.en: She makes all her own clothes.
sentences.cn: 她的衣服都是自己做的。

sentences.en: It was my mother's very own engagement ring.
sentences.cn: 这正是我母亲自己的订婚戒指。

sentences.en: Julie's father owned a business that dealt in bulk orders.
sentences.cn: 朱莉的父亲拥有自己的公司, 专门从事大宗订货。

sentences.en: The man refused to own the child.
sentences.cn: 那人拒绝承认自己是小孩的父亲。

sentences.en: I own that you are right.
He owned himself to be guilty.

means.word_mean: 认领；承认…是(作者、主人等)

sentences.en: He owned that boy as his child.
sentences.cn: 他承认那个孩子是他的。

sentences.en: I own to having known about it.
sentences.cn: 我承认事先知道这件事。

jushi.english: It was my mother's very own engagement ring.
jushi.chinese: 这正是我母亲自己的订婚戒指。
我的时间不属于我自己。

jushi.english: She makes all her own clothes.
jushi.chinese: 她的衣服都是自己做的。
